results.title: Effect of an angiotensin II receptor antagonist, TCV-116, on neointimal formation following balloon injury in the SHR carotid artery.
results.text_hl: In the WKY experiment, both @CHEMICAL_candesartan_cilexetil @CHEMICAL_MESH:C077793 @@@TCV-116@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ suppressed @<m>DISEASE_Neointima</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058426 @@@neointimal formation@@@ as well as systolic blood pressure, but did not suppress @DISEASE_Cardiomegaly @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@. 4.

citations.NLM: Kino H, Hama J, Takenaka T, Sugimura K, Kamoi K, Shimada S, Yamamoto Y, Nagata S, Kai T, Horiuchi M. Effect of an angiotensin II receptor antagonist, TCV-116, on neointimal formation following balloon injury in the SHR carotid artery. Clin Exp Pharmacol Physiol Suppl. 1995 Dec;22(1):S360-2. PMID: 9072428
citations.BibTeX: @article{9072428, title={Effect of an angiotensin II receptor antagonist, TCV-116, on neointimal formation following balloon injury in the SHR carotid artery.}, author={Kino H and Hama J and Takenaka T and Sugimura K and Kamoi K and Shimada S and Yamamoto Y and Nagata S and Kai T and Horiuchi M}, journal={Clin Exp Pharmacol Physiol Suppl}, volume={22}, number={1}, pages={S360-2}}

results.title: Elevated vascular angiotensin converting enzyme mediates increased neointima formation after balloon injury in spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: @GENE_ACE @GENE_24310 @@@ACE@@@ inhibitor treatment with 10 mg/kg body weight @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ daily for 14 days by gavage reduced @<m>DISEASE_Neointima</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058426 @@@neointima@@@ proliferation in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ and normotensive @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Neointima</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058426 @@@neointima@@@: media ratio: 0.35 +/- 0.02 for SHR, P < 0.01, versus untreated SHR with @DISEASE_Takotsubo_Cardiomyopathy @DISEASE_MESH:D054549 @@@balloon injury@@@; 0.28 +/- 0.01 for SD, P < 0.01, versus untreated SD @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @DISEASE_Takotsubo_Cardiomyopathy @DISEASE_MESH:D054549 @@@balloon injury@@@).

citations.NLM: Jandeleit-Dahm K, Burrell LM, Johnston CI, Koch KM. Elevated vascular angiotensin converting enzyme mediates increased neointima formation after balloon injury in spontaneously hypertensive rats. J Hypertens. 1997 Jun;15(6):643-50. PMID: 9218184
